class classes.Sequence¶

Bases: object

This is a conceptual class representation of input genetic code sequence.

Parameters

  • code (string) – Input sequence

  • start_kodon (list) – List of starting translation positions

  • stop_kodon (list) – List of stop translation positions

  • type (integer) – Type of input sequence.

  • transcription (string) – Transcribed sequence

  • s_array (list) – List of sequences that are translatable from input sequence code.

  • amino (list) – List of amino acides.

getSequence(stack, destination)¶

This method obtains sequence from stack.

Parameters

  • stack – Input stack.

  • destination (string) – Storage of extracted sequence.

class classes.Stack¶

Bases: object

This class represents stack and its methodes.

isEmpty()¶

Returns empty stack.

pop()¶

Pops item from stack.

push(item)¶

Pushes item onto stack.

size()¶

Returns stack size.
